sentences.en: China is the birthplace of tea, as the " homeland of tea. "
sentences.cn: 中国是茶的发祥地, 被誉为 “ 茶的祖国 ”.

sentences.en: Cooperstown, New York, is said to be the birthplace of baseball.
sentences.cn: 据说纽约州的库佰斯顿是棒球的发源地.

sentences.en: England is the birthplace of the modern novel.
sentences.cn: 英国是近代小说发源地.

sentences.en: Hawaii was the birthplace of surfing.
sentences.cn: 夏威夷是冲浪运动的发源地。

sentences.en: He travelled from his birthplace to his new home.
He was resigned to never seeing his birthplace again.
sentences.cn: 永远不再去他的出生地，他也认了。

sentences.en: I remember fondly the sounds of my birthplace -- the sounds of thunder and of rain.
sentences.cn: 我怀想着故乡的雷声和雨声.

sentences.en: I thought of the person in my birthplace who used to release the ducklings.
sentences.cn: 我想起故乡放雏鸭的人了.

sentences.en: It was based on Faulkner's own birthplace of Oxford County.
sentences.cn: 这是根据福克纳的出生地牛津郡写的.

sentences.en: Many music - lovers make pilgrimages to Mozart's birthplace.
sentences.cn: 很多爱好音乐的人去访问莫扎特的出生地.

sentences.en: Never was a man less proud of his birthplace.
sentences.cn: 象他那样不喜欢家乡的人实不多见.
埃文河畔的斯特拉特福是莎士比亚的出生地。

sentences.en: Such colonists would be liable to modification, the principle of inheritance still betraying their original birthplace.
sentences.cn: 这类移居者虽易起变化, 然而遗传原理还是泄露了它们的原产地.

sentences.en: The company is located in Ningbo, Sea zone, Chiang Kai - shek's birthplace - Fenghua City.
sentences.cn: 公司地处东海之滨的宁波经济区, 蒋介石先生的出生地 - 奉化市.

sentences.en: Vienna is the birthplace of classical music and Waltz.
sentences.cn: 维也纳是古典音乐和华尔兹舞曲的发源地.

sentences.en: Warsaw, the birthplace of Manya or Manya Sklodowska, was then ruled by Russia.
sentences.cn: 华沙——玛雅, 即曼雅-斯克罗德斯卡的出生地, 当时正受俄国统治.

words.tran_cn: 生育的；生育用的；分娩用的

trans.tran_en: the place where someone was born, used especially when talking about someone famous
